effect_entries.effect: Held: Decreases the holder's Speed by 50%.  Whenever the holder gains Defense effort from battle, increases that effort by 4; this applies before the PokéRUS doubling effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains 4 Defense effort values, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせると　素早さが　さがるが
ふつうよりも　ポケモンの　防御が
高く　育ちやすい。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s
Defense stat to grow more after battling.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Riduce la Velocità nella lotta ma permette ai punti
base della Difesa di crescere più rapidamente.

Tabla de piedra que potencia los movimientos de
tipo Psíquico. Debe llevarla un Pokémon.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Erhöht bei Levelaufstieg
den Verteidigungs-Wert, senkt aber die Initiative.

Objet à tenir. Permet à la Défense de progresser
plus vite, mais réduit la Vitesse pendant le
combat.

지니게 하면 스피드는 떨어지지만
여느 때보다 포켓몬의 방어를
올리면서 키우기가 쉽다.

もたせると　すばやさが　さがるが
ふつうよりも　ポケモンの　ぼうぎょが
たかく　そだちやすい。
